p: MG-63 cells and U2OS cells were seeded in 96-well plates and treated with different concentrations of IOP. After the cells were incubated in the incubator for 24, 48, and 72 h, 10 μl of CCK8 solution was added to each well and incubated for a while. The absorbance at 450 nm was measured with a spectrophotometer afterward.
